title: Tik Tok Ban, Stimulus Stalemate, 2020
itunes:title: Tik Tok Ban, Stimulus Stalemate, 2020
description:
Guests: Ben Brody, Bloomberg Tech policy reporter, Tony Blinken, Biden for President Senior Policy Advisor, and former Deputy National Security Advisor under President Obama, Drew Littman, Policy Director at Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck, and former Chief of Staff for Senator Al Franken, and Jack Kingston, Former Republican Georgia Congressman, Trump 2020 campaign surrogate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
